I know that hippie-type clothes are not everyone's taste, and that's totally cool. If you like baggy, throw-back attire like this super cool embroidered tunic, you will love this shirt. It's airy and sexy and it gets noticed. It looks great with jeans and some jewelry. It definitely has a flower-power vibe, but it doesn't at all seem like a costume. I'm very small and thin, but I bet it looks great on any body type since it hang very loosely. I'm very happy with it.

评论概述: Hand wash only, Some sloppy stitching, but comfortable and airy
评论详情: It's a lovely, light and airy linen shirt.  The sleeves can be worn down or rolled up.  When rolled up, you can still see the embroidery pattern on the sleeve edge and the shirt has a built in sleeve tie up and nice gold and white button.  The care instructions are to hand wash in cool water, let drip dry in the shade, no bleach.  It's really beautiful and I feel spiritual and peaceful when I'm wearing it.
Light and comfy

I recently got the JoZorro Men's Polyester Linen V Neck Henley Shirt in white and size medium. The shirt is simply amazing. The sizing was spot on as I have a 44.5 inch chest, and the medium provided just the right amount of room. The shirt wasn't too loose or too tight. If you're unsure about sizing, go with your regular size and it should fit great.  The quality of the shirt is fantastic. The fabric is a blend of polyester and linen which gives it a really nice texture and feel. It's also handmade and embroidered, which adds a touch of uniqueness to the shirt. The only downside was that the packaging left a bit of a chemical smell on the fabric, but a quick wash resolved that issue.  The design of the shirt is very versatile. It can be worn as a casual beach t-shirt or dressed up with a nice pair of slacks for a semi-formal event. I particularly like the V-neck and the long sleeves with button cuffs. The shirt also features a caftan-style design which gives it a really nice flowy and comfortable feel.  One thing to note is that the piece of fabric in place on the inside of the sleeves, which holds them up, is a bit long. It would be nice if it was shorter, but this is a minor issue.  Overall, I'm very happy with the JoZorro Men's Polyester Linen V Neck Henley Shirt. The quality, design, and fit are all excellent. I would definitely recommend this shirt to anyone looking for a high-quality and versatile piece.
This shirt is unique looking, lightweight and feels nice. The sleeves are just a bit long, but not enough to take away from the look. Overall, a nice alternative to a plain tee or polo.

I love the look and the feel of this shirt... Especially the feel of the fabric. It is super comfortable to wear and one can tell it's made from a high quality material that's on fitting of the design and style of this shirt.  This is definitely a great quality at a very decent price
